page.title: 16Industry
page.content: There is only one major industry other than farming. This is the quarrying of sand and gravel from three sandpits. Two are off Ebstree Rd. in Seisdon and the third is off The Hollow Way in Trysull. There is a water pumping station near Dimmingsdale Bridge which pumps up 3,000,000 gallons each day from a depth of 1,000 feet. To the south of The Hollybush Inn there is a large electricity sub-station. Recently the road between Trysull and Seisdon has had an oil pipeline laid across it. It has come from Southampton.
